Articles.Content: I have been playing vanilla since 1.0 . I really miss Mechjeb but I cannot seem to get it to work. My path is C, Program Files (x86), Steam, GameData.....I have no idea why it will not work. If anyone has any suggestions I would really appreciate the help. Thanks in advance.

Maybe you should explain what you're doing (pics, log files, text) ... it always helps ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Otherwise for everybody, it's a thumbsuck...

One possibility is that mod plugins are failing to load due to security issues (assuming you have installed the mod correctly which we can't tell without more information such as an output\_log.txt file from the KSP\_Data folder). Try copying the whole of the "Kerbal Space Program" folder out of the steam folder into a newly created folder, e.g. C:\KSP, and then running it from there instead. This also allows steam to auto-update the game without it messing with the install you actually play which can help to avoid issues with KSP updates breaking mods and/or saved games.

Argh, seems I've misplaced my crystal ball again ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) Have a look at [this](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92229-How-To-Get-Support-%28READ-FIRST%29), then post the required information.
